name: MLB.com Home Run Derby VR
description:
Swing for the fences in the first-ever official Home Run Derby VR game presented by Major League Baseball and the MLBPA.

IMMERSIVE VIRTUAL REALITY
360 degree perspective puts you in the cleats of the world's greatest sluggers as you take in the view of MLB's most iconic ballparks. Feel the speed and power of this All-Star lineup as you send ball out of the park.

HIGH FIDELITY GRAPHICS AND ACTION!
The competition comes alive in our unparalleled 3-D environments. Responsive controls provide an intuitive, natural and realistic feel at bat.

PLAY IN ICONIC BALLPARKS!
Step up to the plate in Marlins Park, home of the 2017 All-Star Game. Take some swings at Wrigley Field, or take on the Green Monster at Fenway Park! 8 of the world's greatest ballparks are the backdrop for the ultimate slugfest.

EXCITING GAME MODES
Play bracket-style timed rounds just like the real Derby, or hit as many home runs as you can in Arcade Mode!

BE VICTORIOUS AS YOUR FAVORITE ALL-STAR
Slug your way to the Derby crown with Home Run Derby competitors from 2010-2016 including Todd Frazier, Corey Seager, Adam Duvall, Wil Myers, Carlos Gonzalez, Robinson Cano, Mark Trumbo and more!
